text: Debonair Dancers is a 1986 short American documentary film produced by Alison Nigh-Strelich. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== * *, posted by Alison Strelich Category:1986 films Category:1980s short documentary films Category:1986 short films Category:Canadian films Category:Canadian short documentary films Category:Canadian independent films Category:English-language films Category:Documentary films about dance Category:1986 independent films
title: Debonair Dancers
